import "../../style/pages/user.css" import { useEffect,useStore,useState } from "react" import NameEditor from "../../component/NameEditor" function User () { const store = useStore() const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")) const sessionUser = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("user")) const [logged,setLogged] = useState(store.getState().logged) const [userFirstname,setFirstname] = useState(store.getState().user.firstname) const [userLastname,setLastname] = useState(store.getState().user.lastname) useEffect(() => { store.subscribe(()=> { setFirstname(store.getState().user.firstName) setLastname(store.getState().user.lastName) setLogged(store.getState().logged) }) },[store]) return (

Welcome back
{userFirstname} {userLastname} !
